sel.event.world.player



interface PlayerEvent: sel.event.world.world.WorldEvent;
General player event It can be listened by world and players

abstract class PlayerAnnounceEvent: sel.event.world.player.PlayerEvent;
General announce event

class PlayerSpawnEvent: sel.event.world.player.PlayerAnnounceEvent;
Called when a player spawns, but it isn't spawned to the other entities/players yet

class PlayerDespawnEvent: sel.event.world.player.PlayerAnnounceEvent;
Called when a player leaves the world, but it isn't despawned to the other entities/players yet

class PlayerRespawnEvent: sel.event.world.player.PlayerEvent, sel.event.event.Cancellable;
Called when the respawn button is clicked

class PlayerChatEvent: sel.event.world.player.PlayerEvent, sel.event.event.Cancellable;
Called when a player sends a chat message

Example:
public @event void chat(PlayerChatEvent event) {

   // <player> message
   event.format = (string name, string message){ return "<" ~ name ~ "> " ~ message; };

   // player: message
   event.format = (string name, string message){ return name ~ ": " ~ message; };

   // replace bad words
   event.message = event.message.replaceAll(ctRegex!("fuck", "i"), "f**k");

}


class PlayerMoveEvent: sel.event.world.player.PlayerEvent, sel.event.event.Cancellable;
Player movement, called when a player sends a movement packet

class PlayerJumpEvent: sel.event.world.player.PlayerEvent;
Called when a player hits the jump button
